name: Aéroclub Iba Gueye
about: Aéroclub Iba Gueye, located in Dakar, Senegal, is a premier aviation training institution dedicated to fostering the next generation of pilots. Our club offers a unique opportunity to discover the presqu'ile of Dakar from a bird's eye view, with introductory flights lasting 40 to 45 minutes. We provide comprehensive training programs leading to the private pilot license, ensuring students receive thorough instruction in both theoretical and practical aspects of aviation. With a focus on safety and excellence, Aéroclub Iba Gueye is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation dreams. Join us to embark on a journey to become a certified pilot and experience the thrill of flight.
